title: Physical Science HiSET.S.2.1 (Q17)
prompt:
A researcher hypothesizes that solar cells would function more effectively if manufactured from heat resistant materials.

Which of the following is an improvement of this hypothesis?
feedback:
The initial hypothesis says the solar cell will function "more effectively," but doesn't state what the performance is to be compared to. This makes it impossible to determine whether or not the hypothesis is correct.

So the best answer is:

A solar cell manufactured from heat resistant materials will yield more energy than a comparable solar cell made from traditional materials.
